articles.title: Amazon Kindle Colorsoft Review: Best Picks trials the new reading device shoppers are ‘obsessed' with
articles.author: Holly Hampton-Thayers
articles.summary: Amazon launched its first-ever color device, the Kindle Colorsoft, starting at $399. This 12th-generation Kindle features a color display for images and text, a lightweight design, and is suitable for reading in various conditions due to its anti-glare tech and waterproof design. The device has been well-received, with over 400 orders this month and positive customer feedback.

articles.title: Unlisted Named Top 5 Finalist at TechCrunch Disrupt; Unveils Mobile App
articles.summary: Unlisted launched its new iOS mobile app at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025. The app provides a faster and intuitive experience designed for buyers, homeowners, and agents. It aims to unlock access to homes not currently listed for sale, generating demand and impacting the real estate market.

articles.title: 36 Newer Products Reviewers Are Already Gleeful About
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Olay introduced "Spoonful of Sugar" Body Wash. Vaseline launched Sunlit Glow Body Gel. Dr Teal's launched "Cozy Fireside" Epsom Salt Magnesium Soak.Pyunkang Yul's launched Ultimate Calming Solution Cream. NeeDoh launched Mello Mallo.

articles.title: Morrisons unveils new 2025 Christmas range with more than 640 'quality' items
articles.author: Chris Samuel
articles.summary: Morrisons has launched its Christmas food range, featuring over 640 festive products, including 340 brand new seasonal creations. A key highlight is the introduction of "The Best Signature Collection," a premium line with over 50 new decadent products, easily identifiable by its gold packaging, offering dishes like Sausage Roll Wreath and Prawn Coconut Curry Doughnuts.

articles.title: Make laundry day smarter with LG appliance deals this holiday season
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: LG is offering holiday promotions on its laundry appliances, including washers and dryers with smart features and energy efficiency. The appliances feature AI-powered precision, energy and water efficiency, quiet design, and smart connectivity via the LG ThinQ app. These offers aim to make upgrading to LG's smarter laundry solutions more affordable.

articles.title: Make laundry day smarter with LG appliance deals this holiday season
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: LG is offering holiday promotions on select laundry appliances, including free delivery, installation, and discounted warranties. These smart appliances feature AI-powered cycles, energy efficiency, quiet operation, and can be controlled remotely via the LG ThinQ app. These promotions aim to encourage consumers to upgrade their laundry room with LG's innovative and stylish solutions.

articles.title: NEO launched by 1X: What to know about the humanoid robot that will do your chores
articles.author: Kate Murphy
articles.summary: 1X has announced that their humanoid robot, NEO, is available for preorder. NEO is designed to perform daily chores and offer personalized assistance, featuring capabilities like autonomous task performance, speech-enabled AI conversation, and remote operation with privacy controls. NEO is priced at $20,000 for early access or a subscription service for $499 per month, with shipping starting in 2026.

articles.title: Amazon quietly launches doorstep returns — here's what it means for shoppers
articles.author: Global Desk
articles.summary: Amazon has launched a new doorstep return service in partnership with USPS, enabling customers in select areas to have return packages picked up from their homes. This service, which began in the summer, allows for the return of items weighing between one and 15 pounds and provides a more convenient alternative to traditional drop-off locations.

articles.title: Nothing Phone (1) Launch: Bloatware & Uninstall Issues
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Nothing Phone (3a) Lite now features pre-installed Facebook, Instagram, and potentially TikTok apps. This marks a change from Nothing's previous minimalist approach, which was a key selling point. The inclusion of unremovable Meta system apps raises privacy and security concerns and could impact Nothing's brand perception.

articles.title: 2 national restaurant chains choose Dallas to test market new items
articles.author: Teresa Gubbins
articles.summary: Shake Shack introduced the French Dip Angus Steak Sandwich, a new test sandwich, in Dallas area. Charleys Cheesesteaks & Wings debuted a limited-market test of a new Everyday Value Menu at select Dallas and Tampa locations, featuring items like Crispy Chicken Tenders, Loaded Fries, and Fat Burritos, with combos priced under $8. Charleys will use this pilot program to guide future menu development and potential rollout decisions in 2026.

articles.title: A humanoid robot will do all of your mundane chores for $20,000
articles.author: Nadine Bourne
articles.summary: 1X Technologies is launching NEO, a humanoid robot, in the US in early 2026. NEO will be available for purchase at $20,000 or a monthly subscription of $499 and perform tasks like chores, opening doors, and fetching items, with preorders already open. 1X is using Audio and Visual Intelligence, which allows NEO to recognize and respond when being addressed and enhance interactions.

articles.title: Product Updates: Open-sourced AI narration plugin, and more experiments with recirculation
articles.author: Jane O'Donoghue
articles.summary: The company open-sourced its "AI Narrations plugin" for WordPress, enabling users to generate AI-powered read-throughs using OpenAI's text-to-speech API.  Additionally, the company is launching new merchandise for its pop-up store in November related to the holiday and gift-giving season.

articles.title: Honor Robot Phone: The Next-Generation Smart Emotional Friend
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Honor has announced the development of a new product called the Robot Phone, which is envisioned as an emotionally aware companion. The Robot Phone will incorporate AI, robotics, and advanced sensor technology, including a hidden gimbal for enhanced camera stabilization and self-propulsion capabilities for dynamic positioning. The aim is to create a personalized and engaging mobile experience.

articles.title: TechForce Robotics Accepted into NVIDIA Connect Program, Strengthening Position in AI-Driven Hospitality Automation  Oct. 30, 2025 20:30
articles.summary: TechForce Robotics has been accepted into the NVIDIA Connect Program, granting them access to cutting-edge AI tools and training. This collaboration will enable TechForce Robotics to explore advanced GPU-based robotics, computer vision, and AI simulation technologies for deployment across hotels and hospitality environments, with the goal of enhancing their Robotics-as-a-Service (RaaS) platform and improving hotel efficiency.

articles.title: NEO the $20K home robot sparks memes before it can even clean a room—22 of the best
articles.author: Anna Good
articles.summary: Robotics company 1X has introduced the NEO Home Robot, a humanoid helper, and opened preorders for it at a price of $20,000 upfront or $499 per month. The NEO features Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and 5G connectivity, and stands at 5'6" tall, weighing 66 lbs.

articles.title: First robot housekeeper NEO hits US market for $20k
articles.author: Erin Keller
articles.summary: 1X AI and robotics company has launched preorders for NEO, a humanoid robot intended for basic household tasks. NEO will initially be controlled remotely by human operators to gather data and eventually become fully autonomous. The robot is available for preorder with various purchase and rental options, incorporating privacy measures such as blurring and no-go zones.

articles.title: Suck up over $250 of early Black Friday savings on the Dyson V11 Vacuum
articles.author: P.J. McCormick
articles.summary: Dyson's V11 Extra Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, engineered for deep cleaning across all floor types, is available at Walmart with a $260 discount. The vacuum cleaner adapts suction for optimal performance, offers up to 60 minutes of power, advanced filtration, and easy maintenance.

articles.title: The Pancake Mix That Takes You Straight Back To Childhood Breakfasts
articles.author: Julia Holland
articles.summary: Hungry Jack Buttermilk Pancake Mix is reviewed as a tasty and convenient option, needing only water for preparation. Taste tests and customer reviews praise its fluffy texture, slightly sweet flavor, and ability to soak up maple syrup. The pancake mix can be further enhanced using pantry staples such as buttermilk or beer.

articles.title: Wonder food hall in Reston is open for business
articles.author: Chris Wadsworth
articles.summary: Wonder officially opened a new food hall-style restaurant in Reston on October 30th. The concept offers dishes from multiple restaurants prepared in a single kitchen, focusing on carryout and delivery, with options to order via kiosks or the Wonder app. The restaurant features at least two dozen food concepts including Mexican food, chicken sandwiches, and burgers.

articles.title: This Massive company coming to NJ to bring jobs and growth
articles.author: Judi Franco
articles.summary: Lassonde is investing $200 million to build a new juice plant in Upper Deerfield Township, which will produce fresh juices, smoothies, flavored waters, and frozen concentrates. Lassonde also plans to invest an additional $20 million at their existing facility to strengthen its role as a strategic production hub.

articles.title: Why HONOR X7d is the perfect companion for long rides
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: HONOR Philippines has launched its newest product, the HONOR X7d, a water-resistant AI smartphone. The HONOR X7d features comprehensive drop protection, IP65 water resistance, a 6500mAh battery, and an AI Button with customizable functions; it is available nationwide and online in multiple colors, with prices starting at P9,999.

articles.title: Series of Campaign Films Released for the OnePlus 15
articles.author: Bia Staff
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching its OnePlus 15 smartphone with a series of campaign films. The phone launched in China on October 27 and will launch globally on November 13. Marketing includes films highlighting performance, AI content management tool 'Plus Mind', and design elements.

articles.title: DRUMSTICK Drops New Collab With Netflix's Stranger Things & It's Now In Malaysia
articles.author: Jeremy Ng
articles.summary: Drumstick has launched a limited-edition 'DRUMSTICK Stranger Things Ice Cream' in Malaysia. The ice cream features a creamy vanilla base with chocolate swirls, red velvet cookie bits, and mixed berry sauce. It is available at convenience stores, petrol marts, and supermarkets for RM3.50.

articles.title: $1.65B Alani Nu deal sparks mass layoffs at North Texas energy drink company
articles.author: Chron
articles.summary: Prime Hydration, the company associated with Logan Paul, made an unspecified announcement, suggesting a potential introduction, update, or launch related to their products or services.

articles.title: Canva's new 'Creative Operating System' wants to be your one-stop-shop for AI design
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: A company is introducing a new suite of AI features. The company considers this release 'the biggest evolution of its product to date.'

articles.title: Canva Unveils New Design Model with Enhanced AI Tools Across the Platform
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Canva has launched a significant overhaul of its design platform, centered around a new design model and enhanced AI capabilities called Magic Studio. Magic Studio includes tools like Magic Design (AI-generated designs from prompts), Magic Edit (image manipulation using natural language), Magic Eraser (object removal), Magic Expand (image extension), Text to Image (image generation from text), Magic Presenter (auto presentation outlines), and AI-Driven Slide Layouts (intelligent slide layouts). These new features aim to democratize design, improve team collaboration, and enhance presentation capabilities.

articles.title: This Classic Canned Whipped Cream Brand Has The Best Flavor And Texture
articles.author: Julia Holland
articles.summary: Reddi-wip canned whipped cream is highly rated for its light, fluffy texture, smooth flavor with vanilla notes, and ease of use. Customers praise its versatility, using it to enhance desserts like pie, coffee, hot chocolate, and milkshakes.

articles.title: The discounted SwitchBot Bot can add smarts to your monitor and coffee maker for just $24
articles.author: Sheena Vasani
articles.summary: SwitchBot is offering its SwitchBot Bot for a discounted price of $23.99 with code BXBX20 until November 11th. The SwitchBot Bot allows users to control button-based gadgets, like coffee makers and light switches, remotely via a smartphone and integrates with voice assistants when paired with a hub.

articles.title: iQOO Neo 11 powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC launched in China, Know specifications
articles.author: Pratyay
articles.summary: iQOO has launched the iQOO Neo 11 smartphone in China, powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC and featuring a 6.82-inch 2K LTPO AMOLED display. The phone includes a dual rear camera with a 50-megapixel primary sensor, a 7500mAh battery with 100W fast charging, and is priced starting at CNY 2,599 for the 12GB RAM + 256GB storage variant.

articles.title: Alliwave H90 Pro Review: Ryzen 7 Mini PC Performance
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: BOSGAME M4 Neo is equipped with Kingston OM8PGP41024N-A0 SSD and outperforms the class average with read/write speeds up to 6,932 MB/s. Geekom XT13 ProAcer N7000 2 TB averages around 3,227 MB/s. The latest generation of mini PCs leverage cutting-edge storage technology to deliver enhanced performance.

articles.title: The New Canva Design Model Might Give Us Editable AI Images At Last
articles.summary: Canva has launched its own design model. The company is also adding new AI features to its platform.

articles.title: 5 simple tricks that made my Windows 11 PC boot faster and perform better
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: The article suggests upgrading to an SSD, specifically mentioning the Samsung 980 Pro 2TB SSD, as a way to significantly improve Windows boot time.  Upgrading to SSD will lead to quick boot times and hardly any issues.

articles.title: DJI's Neo 2 selfie drone adds obstacle avoidance and gesture controls
articles.author: Andrew Liszewski
articles.summary: DJI has launched the Neo 2 selfie drone, a follow-up to the original Neo, with enhanced features like gesture controls and obstacle avoidance. The Neo 2 includes a larger battery, increased storage, an improved camera with 4K footage capture, and is priced starting at 1,499 Chinese Yuan (approximately $211).

articles.title: Zaxbys Serves Up Expanded Asian Zensation Lineup and New Holiday Shake
articles.author: Source Staff
articles.summary: Zaxby's launched new limited-time menu items: the Giant Asian Zensation Chicken Finger Wrap and the Sweet Asian Glazed Chicken Finger Plate, both available via the Zaxby's app and online starting October 27, 2025, and in all Zaxby's locations November 3, 2025. Zaxby's also released the limited-time Cookie Butter Shake, a holiday-themed shake featuring cookie butter flavor.

articles.title: YETI dropped a new super-sipping leakproof Silo jug — here's how to get secret early access to it
articles.author: Dawn Magyar
articles.summary: YETI has launched the new leakproof Silo Jug, available in 40 oz and half-gallon sizes, retailing for $50 and $60 respectively. YETI members get early access to the jug, which features PermaFrost insulation, a wide-mouth opening, and a leakproof design. A chug cap version of the jug is also coming soon.

articles.title: Winter is harsh on skin - but shoppers say this moisturiser leaves them glowing
articles.author: Emma North
articles.summary: NecessaryGood launched Bright & Hydrated Moisturiser, a 3-in-1 product that hydrates, brightens, and strengthens the skin barrier. The moisturizer is formulated with ingredients like ceramides, niacinamide, vitamin C, and hyaluronic acid. After testing, 82% of women said their skin looked more radiant and 97% said their skin felt instantly hydrated.

articles.title: LinkedIn Highlights Thought Leader Ad Opportunities in Campaign Manager
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: LinkedIn is enhancing its Thought Leader Ads service by simplifying content discovery within Campaign Manager, enabling brands to easily find and promote relevant user-generated content mentioning their brand or event.  This update allows marketers to search across a wider network and sponsor organic posts, requiring approval from the content creator. The new sponsored content opportunities are displayed in the 'Partnerships' tab in Campaign Manager, allowing filtering by content type.

articles.title: Does Tesco's AI ad platform spell the end for agencies?
articles.author: George Nott
articles.summary: Tesco's retail media arm is launching a generative AI tool to help brands create ads by uploading their brand assets and campaign information, and this tool is expected to 'speed up and scale creative'. This move could impact creative agencies as more retail platforms adopt generative tools, pushing agencies to focus on original thinking and emotionally provocative storytelling.

articles.title: Samsung's internet browser is headed to PC
articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.summary: Samsung is launching a beta version of its Samsung Internet browser on PC, which supports cross-device syncing of browsing history, bookmarks, and passwords. The PC browser, available in the US and South Korea, also includes an AI-powered 'browsing assist' feature for summarizing webpages and translating text, along with a smart anti-tracking feature.

articles.title: Nobody Wants This season two under fierce fire for excessive product advertisements: 'Lame and distracting'
articles.author: EMILY LEFROY
articles.summary: The second season of the Netflix series 'Nobody Wants This' has received criticism for its heavy product placement, featuring brands such as Dunkin' Donuts, Jennifer Meyer jewelry, Fly by Jing, Estee Lauder, and Airbnb. Viewers have described the season as feeling more like an advertisement than a television show, with the integration of these products being perceived as distracting and excessive.

articles.title: Home Depot cuts $900 off washers and dryers – plus how you can get paid to buy one
articles.author: Maya Lanzone
articles.summary: Home Depot is offering significant discounts on washers and dryers from brands like Samsung, LG, Maytag, GE, and Whirlpool, with savings up to $900 or more. They also have a "Buy More, Save More" promotion where customers get extra discounts when purchasing multiple appliances from the same brand. Other retailers like Best Buy, Target and Lowe's are also offering deals on washing machines and dryers.

articles.title: Saudi Arabia Dishwashing Detergent Market Report 2025: Rapid Urbanization & Economic Growth, Preference for Organic and Eco-Friendly Options - Competition, Forecast & Opportunities to 2030
articles.author: Research
articles.summary: The Saudi Arabia Dishwashing Detergent Market is experiencing growth, projected to reach USD 198.45 Million by 2030. This growth is driven by factors such as rising hygiene awareness and a preference for eco-friendly detergents, leading to brands launching green product lines. Companies like Unilever, Reckitt Benckiser, and Procter & Gamble are key players in this market.

articles.title: Popular Baby Clothing Brand Sprog Sets Sights on Pan-India Growth with Phased Expansion
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Babywear brand Sprog plans to extend its presence across India, focusing on safety and sustainability. The brand aims to strengthen operations in southern markets throughout 2025-26 before moving into western hubs between 2027 and 2028. Sprog also plans to introduce hypoallergenic fabrics in its future collections.

articles.title: Next's £29 'relaxed yet smart' jeans 'feel like wearing leggings'
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Next has introduced Jersey Denim Wide Leg Trousers priced at £29, available in black, rinse blue, and sage green. The trousers are made from jersey denim fabric, have a wide leg, and a relaxed fit. M&S and Roman are also selling similar comfortable trousers.

articles.title: OZXchange Highlights Water On Demand's Fund Model For New Wave of Opportunity Zone Businesses
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Water On Demand launched its first Qualified Opportunity Zone (QOZ) Fund, which allows investors to participate in projects that provide clean water solutions. This fund model provides a scalable framework for Water On Demand's investment-driven water infrastructure strategy and marks the Company's readiness to begin taking on projects. The Company's planned $200 million Opportunity Zone Fund is designed to finance modular, decentralized water systems across the U.S., targeting measurable outcomes in water reuse, resilience, and sustainability.

articles.title: How AI Agents Are Reinventing Instant Credit At The Point Of Sale
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Agentic AI provides Klarna and Affirm with the opportunity to integrate their BNPL services directly into the shopping experience. This allows these providers to seamlessly embed their offers.

articles.title: LG Ad Solutions Introduces Agentiv, an AI-Powered Advertising Technology Platform
articles.summary: LG Ad Solutions has launched Agentiv, an AI platform designed to improve efficiencies within its advertising technology. Agentiv will support internal and external agents and begin beta testing with select advertisers, including a data collaboration agent. The platform aims to enhance workflow automation, collaboration, and data accessibility.

articles.title: LG Ad Solutions Introduces Agentiv, an AI-Powered Advertising Technology Platform
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: LG Ad Solutions introduced Agentiv, an artificial intelligence (AI) platform. Agentiv will support the company's suite of internal and external agents. It aims to enhance operational and data-driven efficiencies.

articles.title: YouTube is upgrading old videos to HD and 4K automatically - but you can opt out
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: YouTube is introducing several new features.

articles.title: The 1X Neo Humanoid Robot Is Up For Order - But Don't Buy It Yet
articles.author: José Adorno
articles.summary: 1X, a Californian company, introduced Neo, a $20,000 home robot, that will be able to do daily chores for its owners. Expected to launch sometime in 2026 in the U.S., Neo is designed to automate household chores and provide assistance with everyday tasks. Neura, a German company, was highlighting its 4NE1 and MiPA robots, which are focused on performing tasks that are dirty, dull, or dangerous

articles.title: SYNERGY CHC (NASDAQ:SNYR) Featured on 'New to The Street' - Bloomberg Television, Saturday, November 1st at 6:30 PM ET
articles.summary: Synergy CHC Corp. is featured on Bloomberg Television. They are promoting their Trinity Audio player, described as their R&D consumer product available in major retailers nationwide and online. It is a learning companion that offers on-demand and personalized literacy training for children.

articles.title: SYNERGY CHC (NASDAQ:SNYR) Featured on 'New to The Street' - Bloomberg Television, Saturday, November 1st at 6:30 PM ET
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: Synergy CHC Corp. will be featured on Bloomberg Television's 'New to The Street' broadcast. The broadcast will cover Synergy CHC's continued growth, innovative marketing, and expanding retail footprint for its flagship Focus Factor brand and related consumer wellness products. The episode spotlights Synergy's position in the health and performance supplement market and its strategic roadmap for future expansion.

articles.title: Can this iconic San Francisco retailer reverse decades of decline?
articles.author: The Los Angeles Times
articles.summary: Gap Inc. is launching a new line of fragrances to attract tweens and teens, marking their biggest entry into the beauty category in years. This new product line aims to generate renewed interest in the brand.

articles.title: ‘The Jetsons' comes to life as first robot housekeeper hits market in the US. But this Rosey comes with a hefty price tag
articles.author: Erin Keller
articles.summary: AI and robotics company 1X has launched its humanoid robot, NEO, designed for basic household tasks. NEO is available for preorder with a $200 deposit or for purchase at $20,000, and a $499-a-month rental plan with a minimum six-month subscription is also an option. The robot will perform tasks autonomously, but initially relies on human teleoperators accessible through an app, with privacy safeguards in place.

articles.title: Santander's Openbank Celebrates First Year in the United States with More Than $6 Billion in Deposits
articles.summary: Openbank, a digital bank by Santander, is planning to expand its product offerings by launching Certificates of Deposit (CDs) and introducing new daily-use transaction products. This expansion aims to meet client needs and provide customers in the United States with greater choice and value in managing their finances. Openbank also launched its 2025 brand campaign.

articles.title: Can this iconic San Francisco retailer reverse decades of decline?
articles.author: Lily Meier
articles.summary: Gap Inc. is launching Old Navy Beauty Co., a new line of hair and body mists with scents like juicy pear and seductive vanilla, in some Old Navy stores this week. The line is being tested in 150 stores and will expand to more locations by the summer of 2026. The Gap brand is also planning a launch into the category, including new versions of its popular scents.

articles.title: I tested 4 bidets from Tushy, one of the most popular brands in the biz — here's a breakdown of each one, and why I think they're such a great bathroom upgrade
articles.author: Talia Ergas
articles.summary: Tushy has launched several new bidet models: Tushy Spa 3.0, Tushy Cloud+, Tushy Aura, and Tushy Oasis. The Tushy Spa 3.0 is a non-electric model with warm water and adjustable pressure, while the Tushy Cloud+ is an electric model with a heated seat and instant warm water. The Tushy Aura includes automatic lid and seat lift features and an LED temperature display, and the Tushy Oasis is a non-electric bidet with a slim design and soft-close lid.

articles.title: Meet the first consumer-ready humanoid robot that'll do your chores
articles.summary: 1X Home Robots has unveiled the NEO Robot, a consumer-ready humanoid robot designed to perform household chores.  The NEO Robot will be available in American homes in 2026, expanding to other markets by 2027, and is priced at $20,000 or $499/month via subscription.

articles.title: Firework Unveils AVA 4.0: The AI FAQ Redefining Product Discovery in the Era of Agentic Commerce
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Firework has launched AVA 4.0, an AI-powered FAQ designed for commerce. This new product aims to evolve product discovery by understanding products and communicating effectively.

articles.title: Pinterest Launches AI Assistant to Help You Find Matching Products
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Pinterest has launched a new AI-powered 'Pinterest Assistant' tool in beta for U.S. users 18 and over, designed to enhance product searches. The Pinterest Assistant uses conversational and visual queries allowing users to find products based on visual examples, with wider availability planned in the coming weeks and months.

articles.title: Shareholders That Lost Money on Baxter International, Inc. (BAX) Urged to Join Class Action - Contact Levi & Korsinsky to Learn More
articles.summary: Baxter International's recently launched product, the Novum LVP, has systemic defects causing widespread malfunctions, including underinfusion, overinfusion, and complete non-delivery of fluids. Multiple device malfunctions, injuries, and deaths have been reported. Baxter's attempts to address these defects through customer alerts were inadequate.

articles.title: This $20,000 humanoid robot has a human doing your daily chores
articles.author: Abhinav Kaustubh
articles.summary: 1X Technologies is launching Neo, a humanoid robot designed for household tasks, priced at $20,000 or a $499 monthly subscription, with deliveries starting in 2026. Neo is a remotely controlled robot capable of various tasks, including folding laundry and carrying groceries, and is available for pre-order with a $200 deposit.

articles.title: Handpicked smartwatches for everyday use with smart features and more: Top 10 picks to keep you connected and organised
articles.summary: The article introduces several new smartwatches, including the Noise Pro 6 with AI-driven features, the Samsung Galaxy Watch6 Classic with BP and ECG monitoring, the Redmi Watch 5 Lite with a long battery life, the Fire-Boltt Axiom with wireless charging, the CrossBeats Everest 2.0 with a rugged design, the boAt Enigma Gem for women with SOS features, the Fastrack Limitless Valor with a large display, the Amazfit Active 2 with GPS and voice control, and the Layers Anarc with a stainless steel design. These smartwatches offer a range of features, including fitness tracking, Bluetooth calling, water resistance, and unique designs, catering to different user preferences and needs.

articles.title: This $800 Amazon laptop is on sale for just $300 right now — shoppers say it's the 'perfect budget laptop'
articles.author: Melina Brum
articles.summary: Jumper is launching the 15.6-inch jumper Laptop with Office 365, featuring Windows 11 and a one-year Office 365 subscription. The laptop has a 15-inch HD display, 128GB of storage with an extra 1TB SSD slot and is being promoted as a portable and multitasking-friendly device.

articles.title: Tork Issues Tools and Support for Reimagining Public Restrooms
articles.summary: Tork, an Essity brand, released new guidance to help businesses improve restrooms, focusing on inclusive hygiene, sustainability, and operational efficiency. The recommendations aim to enhance user satisfaction and business performance by addressing user and cleaner needs.

articles.title: NEO domestic robots risk creating a new caste system
articles.author: Peter Franklin
articles.summary: 1X is introducing the NEO Gamma robot, available for pre-order at $20,000 in the US. Alternatively, a subscription plan allows users to rent the NEO Gamma for $499 a month. The robot features advanced capabilities like seeing, hearing, walking, and object manipulation.

articles.title: Dyson's new WashG1 cordless mop is on sale for $70 off
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the WashG1 cordless wet vacuum cleaner, designed for cleaning both wet and dry messes. The WashG1 features dual rollers, self-cleaning capabilities, and is available at a discounted price of $699, down from its original price of $769.

articles.title: Firework Unveils AVA 4.0: The AI FAQ Redefining Product Discovery in the Era of Agentic Commerce
articles.summary: Firework has launched AVA 4.0, an AI FAQ solution designed to transform e-commerce product pages into interactive conversations. AVA 4.0, integrated within Firework's Agentic Commerce Platform, enables brands to deliver personalized interactions, resulting in faster response times and increased conversion rates. It helps brands deliver AI-powered interactions directly at the moment of intent, turning curiosity into conversion.

articles.title: TechForce Robotics Accepted into NVIDIA Connect Program, Strengthening Position in AI-Driven Hospitality Automation
articles.author: Nightfood Holdings Inc.
articles.summary: TechForce Robotics has been accepted into the NVIDIA Connect Program. This program provides TechForce Robotics with access to NVIDIA's AI and machine learning infrastructure, enabling them to enhance real-time robot training, efficiency, and decision-making capabilities for their Robotics-as-a-Service (RaaS) platform. This advancement aims to optimize cost, scalability, and performance across the upcoming hotel automation rollouts.

articles.title: Meta Announces the Launch of CMO Alex Schultz's New Book ‘Click Here: The Art and Science of Digital Marketing and Advertising'
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Meta has launched "Click Here: The Art and Science of Digital Marketing and Advertising," a book authored by Alex Schultz, CMO and VP of Analytics at Meta. The book serves as a comprehensive guide for marketers, entrepreneurs, and business leaders. It offers actionable strategies for reaching audiences effectively, particularly relevant for the Indian market with its thriving startup ecosystem.

articles.title: Well, They've Gone and Done It. They Made a Home Servant Robot.
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: 1x Technologies launched NEO, an in-home android robot standing 5 feet six inches tall and weighing 66 pounds. NEO autonomously performs chores and learns with guidance from 1X Experts, featuring dexterity to grasp cups, open cabinets, and use appliances. The robot can be purchased outright for $20,000 or via a subscription model for $499 per month.

articles.title: Fossibot F114 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Fossibot officially announced the Fossibot F114 smartphone in the fourth quarter of 2025. The rugged smartphone features a 6.67-inch display, Unisoc Tiger T615 processor, 4GB RAM, 128GB storage, and a 50MP dual-camera system, and is powered by a 5000 mAh battery with 18W wired charging.

articles.title: Google Partners with Ambani's Reliance to Offer Free AI Pro Access to Millions of Jio Users in India
articles.author: Tech Crunch
articles.summary: Jio is rolling out a new offer, initially targeting users aged 18 to 25. The service will expand to all subscribers nationwide after the initial rollout.

articles.title: I got 100GB of cloud storage for 49¢ a month and it's so worth it
articles.author: Brady Klinger-Meyers
articles.summary: Google Drive offers a basic storage plan of 100GB for a discounted price of $0.49 per month for three months. The author is using this new plan to back up personal files and appreciates the easy integration with other Google apps and the intuitive user interface of Google Drive across multiple devices.

articles.title: Gannett Announces Third Quarter 2025 Results, New AI Licensing Deal with Microsoft & Updated Business Outlook
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Gannett announced an AI licensing agreement with Microsoft. Gannett is partnering with Microsoft on their upcoming launch of its Publisher Content Marketplace.

articles.title: Perfect Corp. Expands YouCam AI Pro with New Multi-Model Options for Image and Video Creation
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Perfect Corp. has updated YouCam AI Pro with multiple AI models and new video generation options. The update includes features such as text-to-image, image-to-image, text-to-video, and image-to-video generation, supporting top-tier AI engines. This allows users to create cinematic stories from words or photos with technologies like Kling 2.5 Turbo, Vidu Q2, and Google Veo 3.

articles.title: LegalZoom Announces Partnership with Design.com to Empower Small Businesses to Build and Protect Their Brand
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: LegalZoom has partnered with Design.com to integrate Design.com's AI-powered logo generator directly within the LegalZoom platform. This allows LegalZoom customers to access a new service for creating and protecting their brand, alongside LegalZoom's existing formation and trademark protection services.

articles.title: Unlocking US Public Services For Citizens With Start-Up Kaizen
articles.author: David Prosser
articles.summary: Kaizen launched a new day-pass system for state parks in Maryland, which successfully eliminated traffic congestion and significantly improved visitor satisfaction. The company's configurable platform allows governments and agencies to build multiple commerce and purchasing services for their communities. Kaizen's customer base has grown to include 50 agencies across 17 states since its launch in early 2024.

articles.title: From garage workshop to global success: Meet the genius who reinvented the vacuum cleaner
articles.author: ALICE SMELLIE
articles.summary: Gtech, founded by Nick Grey, has a history of launching innovative cordless products. The company launched its first eBike in 2015 and recently launched the DryOnic hairdryer.

articles.title: OnePlus is back with a new Android phone that Samsung can't currently beat
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching its new flagship phone, the OnePlus 15, in the UK on November 13. The OnePlus 15 is powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset and features an updated design, OxygenOS 16 software with AI-driven experiences, and OnePlus's DetailMax Engine for camera processing. It will be available in Infinite Black, Sand Storm and Ultra Violet.

articles.title: Sundar Pichai Celebrates Google's First $100 Billion Quarter
articles.author: Naveen
articles.summary: Google's AI Overviews and AI Mode are now available in 40 languages with 75M daily users. Google is planning to launch Gemini 3 later this year. Waymo is preparing to expand operations in London, Dallas, Nashville, Denver and Seattle.

articles.title: Score These 24 Underrated Things Before They Go Viral And Sell Out
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: Sol de Janeiro launched Cheirosa 71 shimmering body cream to hydrate and soften the skin with a caramelized vanilla and toasted macadamia nut scent. Chasin' Rabbits introduced an eye cream roller for moisturizing and de-puffing the under-eye area. Additionally, a K-Beauty hair perfume oil was launched to add a glossy sheen while calming frizz and flyaways.

articles.title: Fossibot F110 Pro Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Fossibot officially announced the Fossibot F110 Pro smartphone in Q4 2025. The Fossibot F110 Pro is a 5G-ready smartphone powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 processor and features a 6.75-inch display, 8GB RAM, 128GB storage, and a 50MP dual-camera system, with prices starting at P10,799.00.

articles.title: The Algorithm Wears Velvet: Fashioning Campaigns With Machine-Made Textures
articles.author: FPJ Web Desk
articles.summary: Dreamina is an AI-powered tool that enables designers and marketers to generate textures for marketing and branding. It allows users to create elaborate prompts that define texture, tone, and mood, then generate images that can be further refined with editing tools. Dreamina assists brands in crafting sensations, pixel by pixel, allowing designers to manipulate depth, sheen, and softness.

articles.title: Meet Yeex: The All-In-One Super App Simplifying Everyday Life for Nigerians
articles.author: Pulse Mix
articles.summary: Yeex launched a super app designed to simplify daily living in Nigeria by integrating services like food delivery (Yeex Eats), grocery shopping (Yeex Mall), courier services (Yeex Courier), transportation (Yeex Ride), and pharmacy (Yeex Pharmacy). The newest addition to the app is Yeex Errand, a call-based service for ordering food, wine, or groceries. Currently, Yeex is focused on Lagos State before expanding nationwide.

articles.title: Dyson Black Friday is here and they've slashed vacuums by as much as £550
articles.author: Eve Wagstaff
articles.summary: Dyson has launched early Black Friday deals, offering significant discounts on its popular products. The Dyson 360 Vis Nav robot vacuum is available at a reduced price of £649.99, featuring 360-degree vision and app control. Other discounted products include the Dyson Cyclone V10 Absolute, Supersonic hair dryer, and Purifier Cool fan.

articles.title: Revolutionizing Operations: How Customers Are Benefiting from Cyngn's DriveMod Tugger
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Cyngn's DriveMod Tugger has been deployed at G&J Pepsi, U.S. Continental, and Coats facilities. These deployments have resulted in benefits such as addressing labor challenges, automating pallet deliveries, and unlocking labor hours by automating transportation across production lines within the companies.

articles.title: ChatGPT is becoming the next frontier for digital advertising
articles.author: Hila Gil
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched 'Instant Checkout,' a new feature within ChatGPT enabling direct in-chat product purchases. The company is also exploring avenues for monetization, including service-based advertising, premium business models, a GPT Store, and transaction commissions. OpenAI aims to integrate e-commerce platforms like Amazon in the future, prioritizing user trust and a clear revenue-sharing framework.

articles.title: LTIMindtree Launches BlueVerse™ with OGI, Benchmark for Autonomous ITSM Solutions
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: LTIMindtree launched BlueVerse™ with OGI, an agentic IT Service Management (ITSM) platform. BlueVerse Tech Operations is designed to manage enterprise operational challenges autonomously and enhance productivity and operational efficiency through real-time observability, business-driven insights, and adaptive resolution.

articles.title: DistroKid Launches Direct-to-Fan Merch Service for Artists
articles.author: Billboard
articles.summary: DistroKid launched a direct-to-fan merch service.

articles.title: Big discounts on robot vacuum cleaners: Automate home cleaning with top options, up to 90% off
articles.author: Bharat Sharma
articles.summary: The article highlights the launch of ECOVACS DEEBOT N30 Plus White 2 in 1 Robot Vacuum & Mop, featuring a Multi-Cyclone Auto-Empty Station, 10000 Pa Suction, and covers 3500+sq ft. Other robot vacuum cleaners like those from Ecovacs, Dreame, ILIFE, AGARO and Eureka Forbes mentioned in the article have reimagined what 'clean' means for busy homes. The Dreame D9 Max Gen2 tackles hair on carpets and hard floors without clogging, and the Dreame L10s Ultra offers hands-off cleaning with dust and mop pad management.

articles.title: LTIMindtree Launches BlueVerse™ with OGI, Benchmark for Autonomous ITSM Solutions
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: LTIMindtree launched BlueVerse™ with OGI, a next-generation agentic IT Service Management (ITSM) platform designed to autonomously manage operational challenges for enterprises. This platform is part of BlueVerse™ Tech Operations and aims to evolve IT service management from reactive incident handling to proactive and predictive operational intelligence.

articles.title: LTIMindtree Launches BlueVerse™ with OGI, Benchmark for Autonomous ITSM Solutions
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: LTIMindtree launched BlueVerse™ with OGI, a next-generation agentic IT Service Management (ITSM) platform. This platform is designed to autonomously manage operational challenges for enterprises. BlueVerse™ Tech Operations aims to evolve IT management from reactive incident handling to proactive and autonomous operational intelligence.

articles.title: Ninja's new SLUSHI Max would make the perfect gift
articles.author: Daily Press
articles.summary: Ninja has introduced a new frozen drink machine. This product is designed for individuals who enjoy hosting parties and creating beverages.

articles.title: Tired of chores? Robot developed to do all home tasks for $20,000
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Norwegian company 1X has launched sales for its AI-powered NEO Home Robot. This robot is designed to function as a domestic helper.

articles.title: PointAI Bags INR 47 Cr To Take Its Virtual Try-On Offering Global
articles.summary: PointAI, formerly Try ND Buy, secured ₹47 crore in Pre-Series A funding from Yali Capital, Lip-Bu Tan, and Tremis Capital. This funding will be used to accelerate product innovation and expand market presence, suggesting upcoming releases of new AI and Computer Vision products and services.

articles.title: Triton Digital Launches AdBuilder AI to Power Self-Serve Audio Buying
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Triton Digital launched AdBuilder AI, a self-serve platform that allows partners to expand revenue by targeting small and mid-sized businesses. AdBuilder AI enables users to create, book, and pay for campaigns independently. Grupo ACIR will use AdBuilder AI to serve small and mid-sized businesses more efficiently at scale in Mexico.

articles.title: Sheets Laundry Club plans to expand manufacturing with new facility in Statesville
articles.author: jkiziah1
articles.summary: Sheets Laundry Club, a manufacturer of ecofriendly cleaning and personal-care products, plans to expand its manufacturing operation with a new facility in Statesville. This expansion includes an investment of $2.6 million and aims to enhance capacity in areas, also the addition of new machinery and equipment.

articles.title: Starbucks Christmas menu 2025: New food and drink options revealed and launch date
articles.author: Courtney Eales
articles.summary: Starbucks has launched its new festive menu, available to Starbucks Rewards members from October 30th and to all customers from November 6th. The menu includes the new Chocolatey Mousse Latte (hot or iced), Iced Toffee Nut Cream Matcha Latte, Iced Gingerbread Cream Matcha Latte, Festive Turkey Sandwich, Festive Feast Toastie, and other seasonal treats like Mince Pie and Chocolate Babka.

articles.title: Suzuki Will Now Sell Indian Curries Along With Cars. Here's How Much One Packet Costs
articles.author: Satyaki Baidya
articles.summary: Suzuki Motor Corporation launched 'Suzuki Cafeteria Indian Vegetarian Curry' in Japan in June 2025. The ready-to-eat meal has sold over 100,000 packets in three months and is available in four flavors. Suzuki plans to introduce 14 additional curry flavors.

articles.title: ‘Payment Declined': How 'Neo' Humanoid Robot Gave Everyone A Sleepless Night
articles.author: Anurag Verma
articles.summary: X1 has introduced Neo, a humanoid robot designed to perform household chores. Neo is available for preorder in two packages: a $499 monthly subscription or $20,000 for full ownership, with shipping expected to begin in 2026.

articles.title: ThredUp's AI Search Upgrade Means Your Favorite Style Goes From Wish List to Thrift Find Faster – [your]NEWS
articles.author: Teri Monroe
articles.summary: ThredUp introduced an AI-powered search upgrade that allows shoppers to describe what they want in detail and receive curated matches. This system interprets intent and learns from user preferences, providing personalized recommendations and boosting visibility for sellers by categorizing listings automatically.

articles.title: 33 'Treat Yourself' Products That Actually Make Your Life A Lot Easier
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Ninja introduced the portable Crispi Air Fryer system for convenient cooking. Londontown launched "Nail Veil" Protectant as a nail enhancer. Built released "Puff Protein Bars," high-protein chocolate-covered marshmallows.

articles.title: A New Orleans-based tech founder just raised $10 million for 'Waldo.' What will it do?
articles.author: Rich Collins
articles.summary: Waldo, a New Orleans-based startup, launched an upgraded version of its AI-powered virtual research assistant. This tool is designed to collect data online and provide insights for business decisions, targeting marketing agencies and brands like Airbnb, Kettle & Fire, and Conair. The service is offered for around $1,000 per month.

articles.title: Vietnam launches national traceability platform for export products
articles.author: Vietnamnet News
articles.summary: NDATrace enables businesses and consumers to verify the origin and quality of products. This is achieved through the use of a single, unique digital ID associated with each product. The service aims to provide transparency and trust in product information.

articles.title: OpenAI's ChatGPT Launches 'Buy In' Trial: A New Era of A-commerce Begins
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched 'Buy In,' a new feature integrated into ChatGPT, enabling users to purchase products and services directly within the conversational interface. This initial trial includes partnerships with brands like Klipsch Audio, REI, Expedia, and Shopify, offering personalized product recommendations and a streamlined checkout process. The 'Buy In' trial aims to increase sales, enhance customer engagement and offer valuable data insights for businesses.

articles.title: Tired of chores? Robot developed to do all home tasks for $20,000
articles.summary: Norwegian company 1X has launched sales for its AI-powered NEO Home Robot, a domestic helper. The robot, resembling a human, can perform tasks like cleaning, washing dishes, and organizing the house, capable of lifting objects up to 25 kg.

articles.title: PreludeSys and its Sub-Brands Evolve into LevelShift to Drive Industry-Specific AI Transformation
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: PreludeSys, along with its sub-brands, has evolved into LevelShift, a new unified brand. LevelShift provides industry-focused AI transformation services, offering customized, vertical AI roadmaps. This marks a shift from horizontal technology enablement to a focus on embedding AI across core business functions.

articles.title: Nothing Phone (3a) Lite with triple-camera, Glyph LED launched
articles.author: Deccan Herald
articles.summary: Nothing Inc., a London-based smartphone maker, has launched a smartphone.

articles.title: Quarterly report Q3/2025: Strong development in Sweden and continued focus on international expansion (Enzymatica AB)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Enzymatica AB continues to develop and market ColdZyme, a mouth spray for colds and cold-like symptoms. The company is actively engaged in partner discussions to expand the product's reach and secure favorable commercial terms. ColdZyme is experiencing steady growth in Sweden.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold Review: Enhanced Durability with Dust Resistance on a State-of-the-Art Foldable Phone
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google launched the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, a foldable smartphone featuring enhanced durability with complete water and dust protection, a redesigned hinge, and the Google Tensor G5 chip. It is priced at £1,749 and includes AI-powered features, a year-long subscription to Google AI Pro, and sustainability initiatives utilizing recycled materials.

articles.title: Hikvision introduces AI-enhanced products, solutions, and services to drive SMB growth
articles.summary: Hikvision is introducing AI-enhanced products, solutions, and services. This initiative aims to drive growth for small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs).

articles.title: WatchGuard: Interview With CPO & SVP Of Product Management Andrew Young About The Cybersecurity Solutions Company
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: WatchGuard launched FireCloud Internet Access, a new product in their hybrid secure access service edge (SASE) family, which provides consistent security across on-premises and cloud environments. The company plans to release more offerings as part of their FireCloud line of FWaaS products. WatchGuard acquired ActZero to help them expand their own MDR service to meet growing demand.

articles.title: 27 Elevated, Comfy Pieces From Banana Republic
articles.author: Cierra Cowan
articles.summary: Banana Republic is offering a variety of new clothing items, including boot-cut pants made from Everywhere Ponte fabric priced at $100, and a cropped sweater vest initially priced at $90 but now available from $34.99. Other new additions include a linen belted wide-leg jumpsuit for $200 and a ponte puff-sleeve maxi dress for $220.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 Price In India Could Be Under Rs 70,000, Here's What To Expect On November 13
articles.summary: OnePlus will launch the OnePlus 15 in India on November 13, 2025. The smartphone features a refreshed design, a square rear camera island, and thinner bezels. It will be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset and is expected to be priced under Rs 70,000.

articles.title: Stylish Clogs for Men
articles.summary: NEOZ introduces Levirex Clogs, offering lightweight comfort and modern design. Max Boys Clogs provide everyday comfort and style. Birde Boys Applique Detailed Clogs offer playful style for active wear. Liberty Men Self Design Clogs combine comfort and stylish design.

articles.title: Samyang Corporation Showcases Expanded Applications of Its AI-Based Standardized Sugar Reduction Solution at U.S. Food Expo
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Samyang Corporation is showcasing the expanded applications of its AI-based "3S (Smart, Simple, Successful) Sugar Reduction Solution" at Supply Side Global 2025. The 3S Solution combines Nexweet® Allulose and Fiberest® to help customers formulate products with reduced sugar content and improved dietary fiber, and Samyang plans to expand the solution's applications to new categories such as ice cream and sauces.

articles.title: Meta's Q3 Results Highlight WhatsApp's Rising Role in Revenue Mix
articles.summary: TheFifth.AI launched as a marketing transformation and consumer consulting firm. Adobe announced AI-driven capabilities within Adobe GenStudio at Adobe MAX 2025. MakeMyTrip introduced Semantic Search for hotels. Taboola and Paramount Advertising launched 'Performance Multiplier'. WPP unveiled WPP Open Pro, an AI marketing platform.

articles.title: Are Agentic AI Browsers Safe?
articles.author: Malavika Madgula
articles.summary: Perplexity AI launched 'Comet,' an AI-native browser built on Chromium, in July 2025. This browser features an in-built sidebar assistant capable of booking meetings, comparing products, and completing purchases, marking a new era in how users interact with the internet. Early users reported a productivity boost of up to 10%.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 launching in India on November 13: Check expected price, features, and more
articles.author: Md Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: OnePlus will launch the OnePlus 15 in India on November 13, 2025. The OnePlus 15 features Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, a triple rear camera system with a 50MP main sensor, and a 7,300mAh battery with 120W wired and 50W wireless charging. The expected price in India starts at roughly Rs. 49,500.

articles.title: Mind Games Teams With Selfridges on Two New Fragrance Exclusives
articles.author: Samantha Conti
articles.summary: Mind Games has launched two new unisex fragrances, Playmate and Check Please, exclusive to Selfridges in the U.K. The fragrances, part of the wider Soulmate collection, were launched with an immersive installation at Selfridges in London and will be sold at mindgamesfragrance.com. The scents are priced at 270 pounds for a 100-ml bottle.

articles.title: 31 Totally Responsible Purchases That'll Make You Feel Exceptionally 'Adult'
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: A variety of new products are introduced to simplify daily tasks and solve common household problems. These include a drip catcher, hoodie hanger, color catcher sheets, and a dog-paw scrubber. Additionally, the article highlights items like a keyboard planner, outlet extender, food savers, a versatile mock-neck top, and cleaning tools. The list continues with a shoe-stretch spray, sheet keeper, tissue dispenser, shower spray, carborundum sponges, travel pillow, wireless bralette, battery storage caddy, pet hair roller, WD-40 pen, shoe liners, plant cleaning wipes, aligner cleaner foam, wood polish, glass cleaner, water bottle organizer, stain-removing pads, coffee maker cleaner tablets, waterproof trash can, garbage guard, pet feeder, and Hoka Cliftons.

articles.title: CapCut Introduces AI Design Tools to Bridge Video Editing and Brand Identity Creation
articles.author: New York
articles.summary: CapCut has introduced AI-powered design tools, including an AI logo generator and a transparent background maker, to expand its platform beyond video editing. The AI logo generator translates user input into multiple visual options aligned with their brand identity, while the transparent background maker automates background removal for seamless integration of images into various media. This integration aims to provide a unified environment for design and video editing, streamlining the process of visual content creation.

articles.title: OPPO launches flagship Find X9 Series globally, with the ultra-premium Find X9 Pro coming to the UAE
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: OPPO, a leading global smart device brand, has launched its new flagship smartphone series, Find X9, worldwide.

articles.title: 34 Must-Have New Products You Haven't Heard Of Yet
articles.author: Celia Funderburk
articles.summary: Nyx launched "Smushy" Matte Lip Balm with a flexible tip applicator and buildable formula. Maybelline introduced "The Colossal Bubble" Mascara to inflate and separate lashes. Eos released Crème de Pistachio Shea Better Body Lotion with a seasonal scent, featuring seven nourishing oils and butters for 24-hour hydration.

articles.title: ‘Liam Hemsworth is a beast in The Witcher – season 4 will devastate fans'
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: Netflix's "The Witcher" has introduced a new actor for the role of Geralt. This represents a change to the existing service.

articles.title: 5 best Nordic noir dramas to binge on Netflix including ‘gripping' thriller
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: Netflix encourages users to begin their next binge-watching session. This prompts engagement with Netflix's streaming service.

articles.title: Zoho Expands AI Access with Free Agentic Tools for Businesses
articles.author: Nigeria
articles.summary: Zoho has launched new agentic AI features across its collaboration, customer experience, and human resources product categories. These features are designed to enhance productivity and automate tasks for businesses, and are available immediately at no additional cost within Zoho's suite of business applications. Zoho aims to make AI adoption practical and affordable by integrating these features directly into its existing platform.

articles.title: Yucheng Datong Hand-Spun Fermented Noodles: 300-Year-Old Intangible Culinary Heritage
articles.summary: Wang Fulin founded a company focused on preserving and innovating "Datong Hand-Spun Fermented Noodles". The company has expanded its product line to include three series: "Datong Hand-Spun Multigrain Nourishment Noodles", "Original Wheat Flavor Noodles", and "Fruit and Vegetable Blends", offering over 40 variants to meet diverse dietary preferences.

articles.title: Ntel To Leverage MVNO For Nigeria's Telecom Market Relaunch
articles.author: Abolaji Adebayo
articles.summary: Ntel will re-enter the Nigerian market in Q1 2026 as a digital-first Mobile Virtual Network Operator (MVNO). The company will focus on innovation, efficiency, and serving a new generation of Nigerians by delivering data and enterprise solutions leveraging existing network agreements.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 review
articles.author: Carl Javier
articles.summary: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 is a top-of-the-line foldable phone featuring a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite processor and an 8-inch full screen. Its slim form factor and multitasking capabilities offer a new mobile experience, making it suitable for productivity, media consumption, and light gaming. Its considered a 'do-everything' device that can replace laptops and tablets.

articles.title: Mazda Rolls Out New Version of Brand Symbol from Japan Mobility Show 2025
articles.author: JCN Newswire
articles.summary: Mazda Motor Corporation announced a gradual rollout of a new version of its brand symbol, reflecting its commitment to the future. This symbol will be showcased at the Mazda booth at the Japan Mobility show.

articles.title: Is Antibacterial Soap Better? Experts Weigh in on the Tried-and-True Formulas
articles.author: Colleen Sullivan
articles.summary: The article features several hand soap products highlighting key features and ingredients. For example, Dial soap is a hypoallergenic and vegan foaming soap with moisture-drawing glycerin that kills 99.99% of bacteria, available in lemon scent.  Another hand wash from an unnamed brand is infused with moisturizers and skin-natural ingredients, offering a fresh scent and creamy lather.

articles.title: You can find so many cheap deals on On Cloud sneakers at Zappos — get ...
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Zappos is offering deals on On Cloud sneakers.

articles.title: Style News: Sam Edelman opens sixth outlet, Saigon youth brands' pop-up and party
articles.author: Straits Times
articles.summary: Estee Lauder launched Advanced Night. This constitutes a new product launch, indicating a release or introduction of a previously unavailable or significantly updated item by the company.

articles.title: Flipboard CEO, On The 15-Year-Old App: ‘We're Just Getting Started'
articles.author: Andy Meek
articles.summary: Flipboard is evolving by integrating Mastodon, Bluesky, and its new Surf platform, which acts as a next-generation reader, to connect stories, podcasts, and discussions across the fediverse. This platform aims to pull together content and conversation from multiple open networks into one place, expanding Flipboard's capabilities and user experience.

articles.title: This New Humanoid Home Robot Costs $20K, and You Still Have to Train It
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: 1X designed Neo robot to perform household chores. Neo is undergoing development to improve its capabilities.

articles.title: DJI's Neo 2 selfie drone adds obstacle avoidance and gesture controls
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: DJI has announced the DJI Neo 2, a follow-up to the Neo selfie drone launched last September. The new DJI Neo has improved features compared to the original, which was priced at $199.

articles.title: Gabriel Marketing Group Joins Brandi AI's Global Agency Partnership Program to Help PR and Content Marketing Clients Strengthen Trust, Recognition and Visibility Across Generative AI Platforms
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: GMG partnered with Brandi AI to deliver a service that helps client brands understand, measure, and improve their appearance in AI-generated answers on platforms like ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, and Perplexity. Brandi AI enables GMG to show clients how they appear inside AI-generated answers and why they do or don't show up.

articles.title: NEO the $20K home robot sparks memes before it can even clean a room—22 of ...
articles.author: The Daily Dot
articles.summary: Robotics company 1X introduced the NEO Home Robot and opened preorders for the humanoid helper. Initial reactions online have been varied, ranging from excitement to humorous comparisons.

articles.title: The 1X Neo Humanoid Robot Is Up For Order - But Don't Buy It Yet
articles.author: BGR
articles.summary: AI company 1X unveiled its humanoid robot, Neo. Neo can perform household chores.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold review: dust-resistant and more durable foldable phone
articles.author: The Guardian
articles.summary: A book-style Android device features cutting-edge AI, good cameras, and a tablet screen. This enables enhanced media consumption and multitasking capabilities for users on the go.

articles.title: Be Branded bridges traditional marketing with cutting-edge digital innovation, helping Australian businesses dominate AI-powered search results
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Be Branded, an Australian promotional products company, is expanding into AI search optimization services. This positions the company as an innovator in next-generation digital marketing.

articles.title: Avalon Labs Launches On-Chain AI Marketplace on BNB Chain: Details
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: Avalon Labs launched its On-Chain AI Marketplace on BNB Chain. The marketplace is a new service offering from Avalon Labs.
